name: Steer Madness
description:
Steer Madness is a story-driven casual adventure game where the player takes on the role of Bryce, a walking talking cow, who was recently rescued from the slaughterhouse and is now on a mission to save all his fellow animals. It takes place in the fictional city of Fairview, where the player is free to explore, interact with other characters, and join in various missions including undercover investigations and animal rescues.

Features
  • Voice acting for all characters
  • Explore a colourful and detailed urban environment
  • Interact with characters and learn the stories behind the animals that need to be rescued
  • Raise money to fund activism missions
  • Obtain and use dozens of different items
  • Your actions will result in animals being saved and businesses becoming vegan!

This indie game was made almost entirely by one person :)
Have a peek behind the scenes in this YouTube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-x6Ti5rc90
